name: Cacturne
description: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiny Punch
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.
